name: Question Meme Generator 2007
description:
Once upon a time, in the mystic age of Flash and journal memes, questions were asked. Questions like "If 3 and 6 teamed up to bake a cake together, what flavor would it be?"* Names of friends and characters were entered. Answers written and shared. Feelings experienced.

This generator will assist in the creation of such questions (and feelings). Originally a small browser project from my DeviantArt gallery, we now live in a world void of the Flash Player plugin. It is high time for a sequel - bigger, better, less-brokier! But until that happens, have a downloadable version of the classic.

PC users: Simply unzip and execute. (Did that sound dirty?)

Mac users: Please tell me if the download works. I have no idea.

*Cake flavor question ironically not included in this generator.
